column1: Services for Mr. Anyan will be held at 10:00 AM on Tuesday
column3: 2015 in the Southern Funeral Home Chapel in Winnfield
column4: with Rev. John Holland officiating. Graveside services will follow in the Garden of Memories Cemetery in Winnfield. Visitation will be on Monday
column6: 2015 from 5:00 PM to 8:00 PM and again on Tuesday from 8:00 AM to service time at Southern Funeral Home.
